description.narrative:
Sverige har åtagit sig att bidra till genomförandet av Agenda 2030 genom personella resurser till EU:s delegationer runt om i världen. För att uppnå detta stödjer Sida Junior Professionals in Delegation (JPD-programmet), och genom programmet placeras 17 svenska JPD på delegationer för att bidra till EEAS eller Europeiska Kommissionens verksamhet.
Insatsen gäller finansiering av femton (15) svenska traineer till EU:s traineeprogram Junior Professionals in Delegation under perioden 2021-2023. I tillägg till de femton traineer som finansieras av Sida kommer ytterligare två svenska traineer att delta i programmet under samma period. Dessa två finansieras av EEAS och Europeiska Kommissionen.
JPD innebär en personell förstärkning till mottagande delegation och JPD förväntas bidra inom de arbetsområden som aktuell delegation arbetar med: implementering av program (EC-placeringar) liksom politisk bevakning/rapportering (EEAS-placeringar). En JPD kan arbeta inom samtliga tematiska områden som delegationen är verksam inom.

Sweden is committed to contribute to the implementation of Agenda 2030 in low- and middle income countries by providing human resources to work with and through the diverse mandates of EU Delegations. For this purpose, Sweden closely collaborates with the EEAS regarding placements in EEAS and European Commission delegations around the world through the Junior Professionals in Delegation program (JPD). Through the program, 17 Swedish JPD's will be placed at EU delegations to contribute to the EEAS and EC activities.
The contribution regards the financing of fifteen (15) Swedish trainees to the EU trainee programme Junior Professionals in Delegation during 2021-2023. In addition to the fifteen trainees financed by Sida another two Swedish trainees will, financed by the European Union External Action (EEAS) and the European Commission, participate in the program.
JPD:s are often viewed as a regular staff member and are, as such, expected to contribute to regular operations. For EC JPD:s this may entail program implementation, while for EEAS JPD:s focus is mainly on political/press function. A JPD may work with all thematic areas that the delegation operates within.

tag.narrative: 17.14 - Enhance policy coherence for sustainable development.
17.14 - Föra en mer samstämmig politik för hållbar utveckling.

17.16 - Enhance the Global Partnership for Sustainable Development, complemented by multi-stakeholder partnerships that mobilize and share knowledge, expertise, technology and financial resources, to support the achievement of the Sustainable Development Goals in all countries, in particular developing countries

17.16 - Enhance the Global Partnership for Sustainable Development, complemented by multi-stakeholder partnerships that mobilize and share knowledge, expertise, technology and financial resources, to support the achievement of the Sustainable Development Goals in all countries, in particular developing countries.

17.19 - By 2030, build on existing initiatives to develop measurements of progress on sustainable development that complement gross domestic product, and support statistical capacity-building in developing countries

17.19 - By 2030, build on existing initiatives to develop measurements of progress on sustainable development that complement gross domestic product, and support statistical capacity-building in developing countries.

17.9 - Enhance international support for implementing effective and targeted capacity-building in developing countries to support national plans to implement all the Sustainable Development Goals, including through North-South, South-South and triangular cooperation.

17.9 - Öka det internationella stödet för genomförande av effektiv och riktad kapacitetsuppbyggnad i utvecklingsländerna till stöd för nationella planer för att genomföra alla målen för hållbar utveckling, inklusive genom samarbete nord–syd och syd–syd samt trepartssamarbete.

sida:strategy.sida:titleSV: Kapacitetsutveckling, partnerskap och metoder som stöder Agenda 2030 för hållbar utveckling 2018-2022
